helpMenu:
**.help :** Displays the help menu, the menu you are currently viewing.
**.hi :** Gives you my introduction message.
**.mcc :** Type this command for more detailed information on i01 after the release of the Master Chief Collection for the PC.
**.beanmeme :** Display a Bean Meme!
**.concept :** Display concept art works from the game.
**.music :** Display link to i01 music playlist.
**.poke :** I wonder what this does?
responseMenu: Hah! I didn't even feel that one.
Did you feel something just now?
